name: huntin' for shades
description:
legend has it that a pair of Cool Shades! is hidden in some sort of cavern like setting located in the middle of nowhere

The Hunter, the person who you play as, goes on a journey to get said cool shades and prove the legend is real not fake

The Hunter can defy gravity at will & float, but there's one catch: the setting has RED water, The Hunter cannot swim

Will you become the Shades Hunter?
